name: Double
description: Double is an action-quest game telling about a fight with a mental disorder by immersing in dreams. Choose your way and find out how this mystical story ends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core CPU - 2.6ghz or Greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card (shader model 2) DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
